msg: Initial import of the User guide (second attempt)

author: adrianc
msg: Fixed a subtle flaw in the GenericDelegator.findOne method. When a database query returns no result, GenericValue.NULL_VALUE is put in the pk cache - so future findOne calls will know the entity value doesn't exist. But the findOne method never checked for GenericValue.NULL_VALUE in cache gets, so the database was queried again for an entity value we already know doesn't exist.
